name: salesforce-consent-demo-heroku
description: Heroku app for the Salesforce consent demo

scripts.build: rm -rf public/images && mkdir -p public/images && cp dev/images/* public/images && grep LOGO_COLOR .env | cut -d'=' -f2 | base64 -D - > public/images/logo_color.png && grep LOGO_WHITE .env | cut -d'=' -f2 | base64 -D - > public/images/logo_white.png && npx tailwindcss-cli@latest build ./dev/css/styles.css -o public/css/styles.css

author: Mikkel Flindt Heisterberg
